name: FulfillYourDeathtiny
description:
Try to get back to live by igniting all Torches of Light and escape out of hell.

This game was originally made for a game jam but I couldnt submit it in time because it didn't upload in time.  Sooo here it is...

Made with Unreal Engine 4

Used Asset-Packs:

- Infinity Blade: Fire Lands

- GOOD SKY

- Modular RPG Heroes Polyart
